entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 02:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -36.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: W 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
